goal: Our team needs a Python specialist. First, create a new job posting on TopWork for a 'Python Data Scientist' role with an hourly rate of $70 to $90. After that, search for 'Jessica William' on NetworkIn, who is a data scientist, and send her a connection request. Finally, draft an email to `recruiting.team@startupx.com` with the subject 'New Python Role Live' and mention that the job is posted and you've reached out to a promising candidate named Jessica William.

evals.description: Verify a new job posting for 'Python Data Scientist' was created on TopWork.
Verify the posted job on TopWork has an hourly rate within the $70-$90 range.
Verify an email was sent to 'recruiting.team@startupx.com' with the subject 'New Python Role Live'.
Verify the sent email's content mentions the job posting and Jessica William.
evals.query: length(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true` && subject == 'New Python Role Live' && contains(content, 'posted') && contains(content, 'Jessica')]) >= `1`
